subject: Doping (Sports)
Cycling, Road
lead_paragraph: Tufts University said Wednesday that while its board respected Lance Armstrong’s cancer-fighting efforts, it had concluded that his “actions as an athlete are inconsistent with the values of the university.”
snippet: Tufts University said Wednesday that while its board respected Lance Armstrong’s cancer-fighting efforts, it had concluded that his “actions as an athlete are inconsistent with the values of the university.”
